title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Carson Wentz on Colts Divorce, Mike Vrabel on AJ Brown Trade, Suns/CP3 Collapse with Ric Bucher
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Carson Wentz on Colts Divorce, Mike Vrabel on AJ Brown Trade, Suns/CP3 Collapse with Ric Bucher
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, (3:00) Washington Commanders QB Carson Wentz  discusses reaction to Colts Owner Jim Irsay’s public criticism following the Week 18 loss to the lowly Jags, if Washington is his last chance prove himself as a franchise QB, and his first impressions of Washington star wideout Terry McLaurin.

Then, (16:00) Titans Head Coach Mike Vrabel explains  Bill Belichick’s influence, when he gained Belichick’s trust, why he wasn’t concerned about Ryan Tannehill’s comments about  mentoring Malik Willis, what he likes about Willis (30:00), when Derrick Henry became truly dominant, and why it was so hard to lose AJ Brown.

Finally, (28:00) NBA Insider Ric Bucher reacts to CP3 and the Suns Game 7 implosion against the Mavs, if they need to make significant offseason moves, if Golden State can be more effective guarding Luka, and if Giannis will win another title.

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
